name: df-smblfn
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(csmblfn, cmpt(s0, csalg, crab(s1, co(cr, cpm, cuni(cv(s0))), wral(s2, cr, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s1)), co(cmnf, cioo, cv(s2))), co(cv(s0), crest, cdm(cv(s1))))))))
comment: Define a real-valued measurable function w.r.t. a given sigma-algebra. See Definition 121C of [Fremlin1] p. 36 and Definition 135E (b) of [Fremlin1] p. 80 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
